properties.name: stormpath.spring.security.enabled
properties.description: A boolean flag that can enable or disable Stormpath Spring Security integration.  This is mostly useful during testing or debugging, or if you want to compare behavior when Stormpath Spring Security integration is enabled or disabled.  Default value is true (enabled).

properties.name: stormpath.spring.security.fullyAuthenticated.enabled
properties.description: A boolean flag that can enable or disable the default Stormpath Spring Security integration behavior of protecting access to all URIs.  Default value is true (enabled).

properties.name: stormpath.spring.security.csrf.token.repository
properties.description: A String flag that can switch the token repository implementation for Spring Security.  Default value is 'session', but can also be configured as 'cookie' so the repository is stateless.
